text.section: Advise the Council regarding comments to other governmental units and agencies on the position of the City of Raleigh with regard to environmental matters.
Advise the City Council on matters relating to fuel efficiency.
Advise the City Council on matters relating to environmental education and awareness.
Advise the City Council on matters relating to environmental awards and recognition programs.
Advise the City Council on policies that the City of Raleigh should implement or amend as requested by Council.
Advise the City Council on such other matters related to environmental quality and safety as the Council shall refer to said Board. (Ord. No. 2006-56, ยง1, 6-20-06)
